title: 2019년 Segura, Jose Ruben 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Segura, Jose Ruben. 판결일: 2019-09-25. 법원: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Segura, Jose Ruben
**판결일**: 2019-09-25
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX


## 판결문 요약

             IN THE COURT OF CRIMINAL APPEALS
                         OF TEXAS
                                         NO. WR-90,173-01


                        EX PARTE JOSE RUBEN SEGURA, Applicant


                  ON APPLICATION FOR A WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS
                  CAUSE NO. W12061-1 IN THE 355TH DISTRICT COURT
                              FROM HOOD COUNTY


        Per curiam.

                                              ORDER

        Pursuant to the provisions of Article 11.07 of the Texas Code of Criminal Procedure, the

clerk of the trial court transmitted to this Court this application for a writ of habeas corpus. Ex parte

Young, 418 S.W.2d 824, 826 (Tex. Crim. App. 1967). Applicant was convicted of aggravated sexual

assault of a child and sentenced to ninety-nine years’ imprisonment. The Thirteenth Court of

Appeals affirmed his conviction. Segura v. State, No. 13-12-00658-CR (Tex. App.—Corpus Christi-

Edinburg Dec. 19, 2013) (not designated for publication).

        Applicant contends that his appellate counsel rendered ineffective assistance because counsel

failed to timely notify Applicant that his conviction had been affirmed and failed to advise him of

his right to petition pro se for discretionary review.
                                                                                                       2

       Applicant has alleged facts that, if true, might entitle him to relief. Strickland v. Washington,

466 U.S. 668 (1984); Ex ...
